    Initial research visit to Kenya

    less than 1 minute read

    Trenton Franz and Kelly Caylor are spending 2 weeks field campaign to central Kenyan highlands.

    The trip is a sort of “fact-finding” expedition, since neither Kelly or Trenton have been to Kenya before. We will be hosted by the Mpala Research Center, which is located near Nanyuki on the Laikipia plateau just beyond the northern slopes of Mt. Kenya. Some images from the trip are located here.

    Tags: Dryland Ecohydrology, Kelly Caylor, Mpala Research Center, Trenton Franz

    Categories: Field Work, Research

    Updated: July 01, 2006
